title: Ticket #4450: Race condition in shadow
description:
We get occasional shadow exceptions which if not expected, will fail a test. The assertion error can be seen as a remark in ticket #3724. The job is a script which catches all the signals it can and its output is streamed back and after the output gets to a certain size we place the jobs on hold.

We then check to see if sigterm was ignored, if it was we remove the job.

We are killing a job which is streaming back std out.
